thread.title: To All Those Still Mad About Trump’s “Travel Ban” – Look Who’s Banning JEWS…
thread.title_full: To All Those Still Mad About Trump’s “Travel Ban” – Look Who’s Banning JEWS…

author: Nickarama
title: To All Those Still Mad About Trump’s “Travel Ban” – Look Who’s Banning JEWS…

organizations.name: united arab emirates  as the daily wire

text:
08:27pm February 3, 2017   
This past week, we have heard continuously about President Donald Trump’s “Muslim Ban” on all media. 
There was even a trending hashtag on Twitter, so we know it must be true. 
But for those who actually read the executive order and report the facts, the order was far from a ban on Muslims. 
Indeed it only applied to 7 countries for a limited period of time, with 40+ other Muslim countries, not being affected at all. 
It didn’t apply to most of the Muslims of the world. Some ban. 
But many of those countries do have real bans, on Israeli Jews. 
According to Daily Wire , here a list of the 16 Muslim countries that ban Israeli Jews: 
Syria, Iran, Iraq, Yemen, Libya, Algeria, Bangladesh, Brunei, Kuwait, Lebanon, Malaysia, Oman, Pakistan, Sudan, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates 
As the Daily Wire points out, there’s a lot of hypocrisy going on with the protesters. 
“In the light of the fact that most of the countries covered by the Trump ban have a total exclusion on the admission of Israeli citizens, shouldn’t the protestors also be calling for that ban to be lifted?” asked former Northern Ireland Secretary Theresa Villier at a Q&A session with Prime Minister Theresa May Wednesday. 
Indeed. 
Unlike the Trump temporary ban, Israeli Jews aren’t kept out of those countries because of any legitimate fears of attack, they’re kept out because they’re Jewish. 
Time that those countries are called out for the anti-Semitism… LIKE this article?
